name: HusbandOrSon
0:
”Alexa, open husband or son”
”Alexa, ask husband or son to say a quote”
”Alexa, ask husband or son to tell me a quote”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: husband or son
des: These quotes were overheard at home by either the husband or the son. Can you guess who?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
